sentences.en: a restaurant capable of seating 100 diners
All dogs are capable of doing harm to human beings.
sentences.cn: 只要是狗就可能会咬人。

sentences.en: He appeared hardly capable of conducting a coherent conversation.
sentences.cn: 他好像连话都说不清楚。

sentences.en: He is regarded as very capable but unexciting.
sentences.cn: 他被认为非常有能力，但为人乏味。

sentences.en: He was capable of writing things of startling originality.
sentences.cn: 他能够写出极具创意的作品。

sentences.en: I believe I am capable of calculating the political consequences accurately.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我能准确预料此事的政治后果。

sentences.en: I don’t think he’s capable of murder.
sentences.cn: 我认为他没有能力杀人。

sentences.en: I’m perfectly capable of looking after myself, thank you!
sentences.cn: 我完全能够自己照顾自己，多谢了！

sentences.en: If we did all the things we are capable of doing, we would literally astound ourselves.
sentences.cn: 如果把我们能做到的都做了，最终连我们自己都会被吓到。

sentences.en: It is hard to imagine Lineker capable of anything so extreme.
sentences.cn: 很难想象莱恩克尔能做出如此极端的事情。

sentences.en: It is in a storm that a capable skipper distinguishes himself.
Nobody had thought him capable of that kind of thing.
sentences.cn: 谁都没想到他能干出那种事情来。

sentences.en: The company isn’t capable of handling an order that large.
sentences.cn: 那家公司没有能力应付那么大的订单。

sentences.en: The job went to Yuri Skokov, a capable administrator.
sentences.cn: 尤里·斯科科夫得到了这份工作，他是一位能干的管理人员。

sentences.en: The larger firm was capable of providing a better range of services.
sentences.cn: 较大的公司能够提供一系列更好的服务。

sentences.en: The society was looking for a capable research worker.
sentences.cn: 该协会在物色一位有能力的研究人员。

sentences.en: You're no more capable of speaking Chinese than I am.

words.tran_cn: 有需要的,可以的,易接受的,有某种倾向的
